fields.text: Thank you for calling Invitae in San Francisco, where genetic insights can change everything.
For information about test results and genetic counseling, press [INDEX].
To speak with a genetic counseling specialist, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a genetic counseling specialist.
For assistance with lab processing and technical support, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our lab processing support team.
For new test orders and account inquiries, press [INDEX].
To place a new test order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to the new orders department.
For billing and account questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and account support team.
